thread.title: Any closer to the tube and you would be sleeping in the station
thread.title_full: Any closer to the tube and you would be sleeping in the station - Review of Premier Inn London Archway, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: johndavies68
title: Any closer to the tube and you would be sleeping in the station
text:
Got off the northern line at archway.come out of the station and turn left .now you have 2 choices of entrance.go past mcdonalds and turn right and you have premier inns car park and main reception entrance, or turn right before mcdonalds and you have the second unmanned entrance.time to both entrances about 45-60 seconds.check in was very proffesional and staff member very pleasant.was given room 401 a corner room.nice big size room, 1 double and 1 single bed for the 3 of us and a great big bathroom with shower and bath.good t.v with most of the freeview channels.nice clean room .window does not open but aircon in room.we had breakfast for the 3 days we stayed.pre book as we paid less than the price showing in the hotel.kids eat free for every adult paying.good choice of hot and cold food.sausage,bacon,black pudding,eggs,beans,mushrooms and also croissants ,pasteries and muffins etc.unlimited coffee at the costa coffee machine .but if you want hot choclate just ask a member of staff.breakfast staff very quick cleaning plates away.i found the town very safe and plenty of takeaways and places to sit down to eat.if back in london would book this same hotel again.by then they should have fixed the 1 out of 2 lifts that were not working during our stay.only grumble.we stayed 3 nights and did not hear any noise during our stay.this hotel i would highly recommend.many thanks to the staff from the Davies family
Room Tip: corner rooms are nice and big See more room tips
